intro: Psychotria moonii, commonly known as the Moon's Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the rainforests of Central and South America, particularly in regions with high humidity and warm temperatures. The plant is characterized by its striking, dark green leaves and small, clustered white or pale yellow flowers. It is often found growing in the understory of tropical forests, where it thrives in partial shade. Due to its unique appearance and ecological role, it is of interest to botanists and conservationists alike.
